page.title: 02STRATHNAIRN HALL, DAVIOT.
page.content:
{ Strathnairn hall}is in Daviot.It is a rather large building and was built in 1979. The old hall was wooden and was pulled down when the new hall was built. .The hall costs Â£1.50 to hire for 1 hour and 6p every unit of heat.There are lots of activities in the hall. {Monday}- school gym classes and badmington . {Tuesday -}play group {Wednesday}- girls club, bowling {Thursday}- W.R.I. and other monthly meetings.- {Friday}- private functions {Saturday}- Sometimes there are sales of work and other things like that. The hall is in the centre of the village.It is easily seen from the A9.
.
